sections.heading: to 28-13-14 - Repealed.Section 28-13-15 - Repealed.Section 28-13-16 - Recompiled.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 2004, ch. 19, § 33 repealed 28-13-1 to 28-13-14 NMSA 1978, effective May 19, 2004. For provisions of former sections,seethe 2003 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1979, ch. 317, § 12, repealed 28-13-15 NMSA 1978, relating to the exemption of the responsibilities of the veterans' service committee from the authority of the secretary of the human services department, effective July 1, 1979.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text:
History:Laws 1921, ch. 61, § 1; C.S. 1929, § 122-401; Laws 1941, ch. 103, § 1; 1941 Comp., § 66-1501; 1953 Comp., § 74-2-1; Laws 1987, ch. 217, § 1; 1978 Comp., § 28-13-16, recompiled as § 14-8-17 by Laws 2004, ch. 19, § 31.

Recompilations.— Laws 2004, ch. 19, § 31 recompiled former 28-13-16 NMSA 1978 as 14-8-17 NMSA 1978, effective May 19, 2004.
